Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp

Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
Package
Description
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth
Email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) for SMTP.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler
SMTP server handler interfaces.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    Class
    Description
    BodyType
    SMTP message body type as declared via the BODY parameter.
    DeliveryRequirements
    Represents delivery requirements and preferences for a message.
    DSNEnvelopeParameters
    DSN envelope parameters from the MAIL FROM command.
    DSNNotify
    DSN notification types as defined in RFC 3461.
    DSNRecipientParameters
    DSN recipient parameters from the RCPT TO command.
    DSNReturn
    DSN return type as defined in RFC 3461.
    SMTPConnectionMetadata
    Interface providing metadata about an SMTP connection for policy decisions.
    SMTPPipeline
    Generic pipeline interface for SMTP message processing.
    SMTPServer
    Connection factory for SMTP connections on a given port.
    SMTPServerMetrics
    OpenTelemetry metrics for SMTP servers.
